SerialPort.name: Serial port
SerialPort.description: The (virtual) serial port connected to the UPS

UpsBeep.name: UPS beep
UpsBeep.description: Use this option to enable/disable UPS alarm when AC power is lost

UpsShutdownTimers.name: Shut down and restore delays
UpsShutdownTimers.description: Yadoms sends these timers to UPS at shut down command, to manage how the UPS output is power-cut or power-restored

ShutdownDelay.name: Shut down delay (minutes)
ShutdownDelay.description: After receiving command from Yadoms, UPS will wait this delay before shutting down its output. It's useful to let system stop properly.

RestoreDelay.name: Restore delay (minutes)
RestoreDelay.description: After AC power is recovered, UPS will wait for this delay before to restore power at output.
